00035  
00036 class Segment
00037 {
00038 public:
00039 
00040     Segment(int id, string name);
00041     Segment(Segment *stencil);
00042    ~Segment();
00043 
00044     const int       &getId() { return _id; }
00045     const string    &getName() { return _name; }
00046 
00047     const vec       &getPos() const { return _CoM; }
00048     void             setPos(vec pos) { _CoM = pos; }
00049     void             calcPos();
00050     void             TranslateBy(const vec &shift);
00051 
00052     void             setHasState(bool yesno, int e_h);
00053     bool             hasState(int e_h);
00054 
00055     const double     getOcc(int e_h);
00056     void             setOcc(double occ, int e_h);
00057 
00058     void             setU_cC_nN(double dU, int state);
00059     void             setU_nC_nN(double dU, int state);
00060     void             setU_cN_cC(double dU, int state);
00061     const double     getU_cC_nN(int state);
00062     const double     getU_nC_nN(int state);
00063     const double     getU_cN_cC(int state);
00064 
00065     const double     getEMpoles(int e_h);
00066     void             setEMpoles(int e_h, double energy);
00067     bool             hasChrgState(int e_h) { return _hasChrgState[e_h+1]; }
00068     void             setChrgStates(vector<bool> yesno) { _hasChrgState = yesno;}
00069 
00070     inline void      setTopology(Topology *container) { _top = container; }
00071     Topology        *getTopology() { return _top; }
00072     inline void      setMolecule(Molecule *container) { _mol = container; }
00073     Molecule        *getMolecule() { return _mol; }
00074     inline void      setType(SegmentType *type) { _typ = type; }
00075     SegmentType     *getType() { return _typ; }
00076 
00077     void             AddFragment( Fragment* fragment );
00078     void             AddAtom( Atom* atom );
00079     void             AddPolarSite(PolarSite *pole);
00080     vector< Fragment* > &Fragments() { return _fragments; }
00081     vector < Atom* >    &Atoms() { return _atoms; }
00082     vector<PolarSite*>  &PolarSites() { return _polarSites; }
00083 
00084 
00085     void Rigidify();
00086 
00087     void WritePDB(FILE *out, string tag1 = "Fragments", string tag2 = "MD");
00088

00090

00092     Molecule    *_mol;

00094

00097     vector < PolarSite* >   _polarSites;

00100     int         _id;
00101     vec         _CoM;
00102 
00103 
00104     double _U_cC_nN_e;   // from ::EInternal     input     DEFAULT 0
00105     double _U_cC_nN_h;
00106 
00107     double _U_nC_nN_e;   // from ::EInternal     input     DEFAULT 0
00108     double _U_nC_nN_h;
00109 
00110     double _U_cN_cC_e;   // from ::EInternal     input     DEFAULT 0
00111     double _U_cN_cC_h;
00112 
00113     double _ePolar_e;    // from ::EMultipole    output    DEFAULT 0
00114     double _ePolar_h;
00115 
00116     double _occ_e;       // from ::KMC           output    DEFAULT 0
00117     double _occ_h;
00118 
00119     bool   _has_e;       // from ::EInternal     input     DEFAULT 0
00120     bool   _has_h;
00121 
00122 
00123     vector< double > _eMpoles;
00124     //   +1(=> h)   e.static + pol. energy E(+1) - E(0)
00125     //   -1(=> e)   e.static + pol. energy E(-1) - E(0)
00126     vector<bool> _hasChrgState;

00129     // qmid => position
